name: Wagdog
body:
The sacred Order of the Wagdog tradition is upheld at all toxicology events where our Lord Wagner is present. Disciples are inducted into the Order when they consume a wagdog in the presence of his Holiness our Lord Wagner. To declare your intent to become a disciple contact Sarah the High Priestess of the Order of the Wagdog [here](mailto:highpriestess@orderwagdog.com). Once you contact the High Priestess you will be notified via email of future opportunities for induction into the Order. 


Testimonials
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
